# newarkmining project

![Image](data:image/png;base64,)

newark.py is a datamining project about Newark airport website.
This progrem scrapes data about departures and arrivals flights with the following infrmation:
- City (Destination or Origin)
- Estimated departure time
- Flight number
- Airline
- Departure and Arrival Terminal
- Departure and Arrival Gate
- Actual departure time
- Actual arrival time
- Flight status

Data can be of flights of today, yesterday or tomorrow in 4 times ranges: 0-6, 6-12, 12- 18, 18-0. 

### How to use:
Choose the day (today, yesterday tomorrow) and what information you want to get: arrivals or departures. 
If you wish, you can also specify other parameters for filtering:
destination, time, time range, terminal etc. 
From the command line call main.py, see help for more commands.

### Requierments:

| Package | Version |
| ------ | ------ |
| beautifulsoup4 |4.9.3 |
| bs4 | 0.0.1 |
| mysql-connector-python | 8.0.22 |
| grequests | 0.6.0 |
| requests | 2.24.0 |
| logging |  |
| pandas as pd | 1.0.5 |
| from datetime import date |  |
| from datetime import timedelta |  |
| argparse | 1.4.0 |
